article.title: General Atomics to Support Unmanned Aircraft System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Incorporated, was recently awarded a $64 million contract for product support, logistical support and sustainment operations to the Extended Range/Multi-Purpose Quick Reaction Capability Unmanned Aircraft System.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
